categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This individual served as the first officer aboard the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Harbinger under the command of Captain Gilad Pellaeon. After speaking with Director Orson Krennic about Grand Admiral Thrawn, Grand Admiral Balanhai Savit requested a meeting with Pellaeon and his first officer aboard the Firedrake about the captain's next pirate-hunting mission.
